title: Puerto Rico Food Inflation
description: Cost of food in Puerto Rico increased 9.60 percent in August of 2022 over the same month in the previous year. Food Inflation in Puerto Rico averaged 2.50 percent from 2005 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 9.69 percent in December of 2008 and a record low of -1.60 percent in December of 2016. This page provides - Puerto Rico Food Inflation - actual values, historical data, forecast, chart, statistics, economic calendar and news.
author: Government Development Bank for Puerto Rico
